law.text: Witnesses summoned by a subpoena in a discriminatory housing proceeding shall be entitled to the same witness and mileage fees as witnesses in proceedings in Circuit Court.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 321, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 282, sec. 29, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 2, Art. 5, sec. 509.
